title: Outward Bound - Willing and Able
brief_description: Part 1(a) “Willing and Able”. Outward Bound Australia conducts adventure based personal development programs combining able-bodied and physically disabled people. For those who choose an adventure, such as the one conducted on the Snowy River, there are rewards in addition to experiencing the uniqueness of the Australian wilderness. Part 1(b) “Other Courses”. An exciting overview of all Outward Bound programs. Part 2: Interview with the Executive Director.
